@@ -258,3 +258,3 @@
-  // -XX:UseLibmIntrinsic or -XX:-InlineIntrinsics disables all intrinsics

-  if (!UseLibmIntrinsic || !InlineIntrinsics) {
+  // -XX:-InlineIntrinsics disables all intrinsics listed in the following
+  // switch statement
+  if (!InlineIntrinsics) {
